data.title: We Ask You, Humbly, To Help. Maybe Later Close Sweeney Todd Is A
data.meta_description: Sweeney Todd - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document provides background information on the fictional character Sweeney Todd. It summarizes that Sweeney Todd first appeared in the 1846 penny dreadful "The String of Pearls" as a villainous barber who murders customers by dropping them through a trapdoor into the basement. He works with Mrs. Lovett, who disposes of the bodies by making them into meat pies. Though some claim Todd was based on a real person, most scholars dispute this. The story has been adapted and retold in many forms, most notably in the Stephen Sondheim musical from 1979.
data.text: We Ask You, Humbly, To Help. Maybe Later Close Sweeney Todd Is A
